messages.subject: OT: invisalign
messages.msgSnippet: Is anyone else using invisalign for orthodontic work? I just got my aligners today and they are DRIVING ME NUTS. I have a constant urge to GRIND my teeth.  Any
messages.messageBody:
Is anyone else using invisalign for orthodontic work?

I just got my aligners today and they are DRIVING ME NUTS.

I have a constant urge to GRIND my teeth. Any tips from anyone?

Kristen




****************************************************************

Today is even more important than tomorrow because "today" is a gift, and "tomorrow" might never come.

Today is where hope lives because today is when we can make things better than yesterday.

The only thing we can be sure of is today and life isn't worth living if it isn't lived in joy for as many moments of today as we can manage.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
